Sonic's powers in﻿ STC were gained,frankly overkilled, and could be taken away, unlike Sonic from the current games where he relies on muscle-power. As result Sonic from the games is generally physically super-powered; super strong, super agile, even super flexible, whilst Sonic from 'Sonic the comic' has weird stuff similar to the flash, (apart from the time-altering stuff) and is able to vibrate air (which makes a shield) and can run at the speed of light.
Just for the sake of trivia.
Oddly enough, Sonic in the 'Sonic The Comic' could vibrate his body through solid materials just like the Flash, but STC was created before the nature of Sonic's powers were finalized.

Sonic wins. Not only can he turn Super, Hyper, Darkspine, etc., he can also use Chaos abilities, even in normal form, albeit with much weaker strength and needing a Chaos Emerald.
Also, if you have a physician with a name that even sounds like "Dr. Doom", switch physicians ASAP.
